1058180.name: OMSI 2 Add-On Masterbus Gen 3 Pack
1058180.description:
In creating this pack we’ve bought together a large selection of setvars to customise the buses to your needs. This pack contains several body and chassis variants for the Gen 3 body, including the B5TL, B5LH, Masterdeck and Masterdeck HEV chassis. Each of these can be highly customised through the setvar system. These include, but are not limited to; Assault Shield, glass staircases, extruded wheel arches, different seating types, internal displays systems, adverts, wheel trims, mirrors, and more!


  • High customisability - Setvar system allows for each repaint to be unique, with variations such as the glass staircase, extruded wheel arches and more
  • High detail and accuracy bringing you a life-like experience
  • Realistic operation of each variant
  • Multiple custom destination displays, based on the Hanover and Mobitec display systems
  • Fully functional ticket machine - licensed by Ticketer
  • Realistic sounds recorded from various real-life counterparts
  • Random soundset changes for different variants, making no two journeys the same
  • Random and dynamic events such as a wheelchair assistance alarm
  • Complete intricate systems, including HEV Stop/Start and DPF Regen
  • B5LH Electric Hybrid Drivetrain (Special thanks to Morphi for working with us)

Included Variations
  • Masterdeck Gen 3 Stealth (10.5m / 10.5m 2DR / 11.5m / LDN)
  • Masterdeck Gen 3 Pre-facelift (10.5m / 10.5m 2DR / 11.5m / LDN)
  • Masterdeck Gen 3 Stealth HEV (10.5m / 10.5m 2DR / 11.5m / LDN)
  • Masterbus Gen 3 B5TL Stealth (10.5m / 10.5m 2DR / 11.5m / LDN)
  • Masterbus Gen 3 B5TL Pre-facelift (10.5m / 10.5m 2DR / 11.5m / LDN)
  • Masterbus Gen 3 B5TL Open Top (11.5m)
  • Masterbus Gen 3 B5LH Stealth (10.5m / 10.5m 2DR / 11.5m / 11.5m 2DR / LDN)
  • Masterbus Gen 3 B5LH Pre-facelift (10.5m / 10.5m 2DR / 11.5m / 11.5m 2DR / LDN)
